name: SpeakEasy (Captain Turnip, Vu Nguyen, kekkekin, luzoko)
name_original: SpeakEasy (Captain Turnip, Vu Nguyen, kekkekin, luzoko)
description:
Tonight's the big night! ...Or it might be, if you remembered what it was. It's date night at a jazz bar, but you're on the receiving end of the cold shoulder! Fumble your way through the conversation as the music plays in this conversation based rhythm game!

Made for Georgia Tech Global Game Jam 2023.

Credits:

Logan Bowers: System Programming, Music
Captain Turnip: Character Artist, Art Direction
luzoko: UI/General Programming, 2D Animation, Writing
Chris Lee: Music
Yoon Lee: Music, Production, Narrative Design
Vu Nguyen: Environment Art
Mitchell Philipp: Technical Art
Kevin Sadi: Audio Programming, Music
